post:
RaidLogic.NET - Virtual Private Server line is the ideal solution for clients who require the control of a dedicated server matched with the affordability and simplicity of a traditional shared hosting account. Look over our plans, standard features and customization options. You can order and customize your plan online and we'll get you set up right away

To order please choose the plan that is best for you.

========

All Virtual Private Server includes the following:

Redundant power backup.
Automated generator system.
Failed hardware replacement.
99.9% uptime guarantee.
No long term contract.
Intel® or AMD® Processors.
Full root access.
Access to SolusVM™ VPS control panel.
Free reboot ticket submission.
Free CISCO™ GUARD DDOS protection.
24x7x365 technical support.
24x7x365 network monitoring.
Private MRTG links.
1 IP address.

Extra Features Included:

FREE Migration included.
FREE 5GB Offsite FTP Backup Account.

========

500GB Bandwidth

We offer instant setup on all our VPS we have an automated system to verify order, verification may take a estimate time of 30 to 60 minutes.

Thank you
